website_summaries.verdict: This versatile cotton sun hat comes in a range of color choices, and while it has a smaller brim than some, it offers protective coverage.
pros: Comes in lots of colors including aqua, black, chino, coral, denim, desert, fuchsia, linen, navy, oatmeal, periwinkle, turquoise, walnut, and white
cons: Size may run small for some

customer_reviews.title: Love this hat!
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful hat! Functional and super stylish! I love it. I'll be buying these as gifts. They're a treasure I wish if known of sooner. I've attached a photo so you can see the brim size on a person. I could find many photos online before ordering. The brim is completely adjustable and you can flip it up/mold it easily.
customer_reviews.author: JenInTn

customer_reviews.title: classy hat
customer_reviews.text: i ordered for my vacation. this hat is perfect for summer weather, you can wear the brim up or down but i preferred to wear the brim down. i machine washed it after i got back from heavily used during my vacation it lost its shape. however i used spray starch (heavy) to revise it to life!
customer_reviews.author: Code Monkey

customer_reviews.title: I just received my hat this morning and I love it already
customer_reviews.text: I just received my hat this morning and I love it already. It fits nicely, looks good and shades my whole face. I am sitting at a baseball game as i write this and my head is actually cool. I will definitely be buying this hat in more colors. Having had Mohs surgery to remove a basal cell carcinoma from my nose and now awaiting biopsy results of a mole removed from my leg, I don't take chances anymore. You shouldn't either. Buy a hat! And use your sunscreen
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I own a Scala hat similar to the one ordered that I love. But this one not so much. It doesn’t have the two tone color of which the black band is a hidden vent. And black piping edge of rim is stylish on my old one. The new one came very wrinkled! Also the two tone hat is like 5-10 yrs old. It has been machine washed using a ball cap cage like device. It was also worn several days a week delivering the mail.
customer_reviews.author: Darla

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional sun hat
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was ordering white when I clicked on the picture and was rushing so I didn't notice the name of the colour, but it is actually called "Mist" which is a very pale lavender/blue. It's a pretty colour but I really wanted white. Couldn't get it returned within the window so now I've ordered in white as well. It has a very nice shape, a good brim width for protection and you can also roll the brim down for more protection if needed. It isn't for windy days so I wish it had a hidden chin tie as well so one could use in windy weather. I really like this hat.
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: I live in the desert, front and back coverage a must.
customer_reviews.text: My head is a little smaller than average so I always try to buy a hat with adjustable ties or snug inside band. If windy I can tighten I side tie to prevent flying hats or adjust brim for sun and neck protection....great full coverage and most importantly pack able for travel. I have several Scala hats from fedora to soft cotton fold up, loved them all and get many compliments. This order was so fast and offered a rainbow of colors...love them all. I will order a pretty color next.
customer_reviews.author: ray

customer_reviews.title: I saw this hat at a boutique-- I'm so glad I checked to see if I could get it ...
customer_reviews.text: I saw this hat at a boutique-- I'm so glad I checked to see if I could get it online because it's much cheaper on here! I love this hat! Perfect for the sun, and quite cute. I have washed it yet, but I'm not worried about it. I'll hand wash it and then let it air dry. I had to tighten the cords a little, but the hat fits fine and didn't blow away in the beach wind.
customer_reviews.author: Katie R. Herring

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I have to protect my face from the beautiful sun. Because I have a sensitive skin. Very prone to hyperpigmentation. This hat covers my face so well and the fabric is very thick. I don't look like a model, but it doesn't make me look ugly either. Its just cute and does the job. Worth the money. I love the settle color too. I've ordered the black one, but it looked bad on me.
customer_reviews.author: starlove

customer_reviews.title: Love this hat!
customer_reviews.text: This is my "go to" hat! I have fair skin and sunburn easily...so I grab this hat every time I head outside or travel. The UV protection is so awesome! I never fear getting my head or face sunburn. I have this hat in many colors and take it everywhere (just in case). But other than sun protection...it is a very cute hat! I get compliments on it all of the time! It also packs well and it is squishable to throw in your purse, tote or suitcase. It is cuter on your head than it looks in the photo. It doesn't look "old ladyish" either. It looks cute on all ages!
customer_reviews.author: amazonshopper

customer_reviews.title: Great for sun sensitive
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd of these hats. I'm a dog walker and need to keep sun off my entire face, neck and chest. These hats do just that. They are breathable, collapsible but not floppy ( unless washed) and reasonably priced. The only complaint I have is that washing changes the hat. Machine washing cold/gentle still will shrink the hat, even hand washing makes the color migrate and removes the starch or sizing that is keeping the hat stiff so that the shape gets floppy and a breeze will blow the brim down in your face. rather than wash I just buy a new one every few months . a small negative though I really like these hats.
customer_reviews.author: Brodie Kat

customer_reviews.title: Love the Scala Hats!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hat to wear on a trip to Israel. I had bought a red Scala hat several years ago in a local department store. This time I bought it on Amazon. I have folded it many times to put in my suitcase. It has held up very well. I have washed it several times. It has lost some of its stiffness over time, but has still held up. I wanted to buy a black hat this time. The hat arrived promptly. It had a plastic support on the inside to help keep the hat form during shipment. I like this hat so much I would love to be able to buy one in each color!
customer_reviews.author: Mama

customer_reviews.title: Terrific hat
customer_reviews.text: I now have 4 of these in different colors. They are perfect for keeping the sun out of your eyes and off your neck without being too big or floppy. The casual shape is flattering and they come in great colors. The band has a hidden cord adjustment so they fit well. Excellent sun protection and good looking!
customer_reviews.author: larrysyr

customer_reviews.title: Super hat for sun protection even in the wind
customer_reviews.text: Love these hats. I have 2 colors now. They lay flat for packing without leaving a mark. You can roll them up a number of ways on your head as you need to for sun protection. You can lay back and read without a hard, buiky hat behind your head, or a cap that doesn't cover enough. There is a drawstring inside to tighten if needed, but this hat stays on your head very well, even in very windy conditions with the brim rolled up.
customer_reviews.author: maryomac

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, good-fitting hat
customer_reviews.text: I love this hat and the many colors it comes in! I have a very big head, and it's the only real hat I've ever found that will go on my head. I have two. The older one washed nicely and didn't shrink, but I hand washed and air dried it. The brim is big enough to shade my face. My granddaughter checked and said that the sun wasn't shining on my face (already had surgery for skin cancer). Great hat!
customer_reviews.author: Jean7P

customer_reviews.title: not good quality
customer_reviews.text: Never buying Scala again. The hats become limp after awhile and are not supposed to be washed. Coolibar hats can be washed and actually have a better form after washing and air drying. My favorite hats with far superior quality are from Wallaroo and Outdoor Research. Those are excellent hats with quality that is worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Liv

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but too many hats!
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed Scala hats for many years. When I saw the lilac hat, I wanted add it to my collection. For some reason I received three hats. I emailed shortly after I realized the mistake. I have yet to receive a response. As for the hats, hopefully I will find some individuals who may use them. As for the hat, I will give a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Jewell

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS HAT!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a hat person. I'm petite and have a small head and face and most hats look odd on me. The fit is good, I like that I can tighten it if it gets windy. The brim is large and blocks a lot of sun. The material is a high quality cotton that is still breathable. It did arrive wrinkly but you can smooth it out without a lot of effort. I used a clothing steamer. I ordered the "Desert" color and what you see if what you get. Originally ordered "Teal", but it's darker in person than in the picture so I returned it. Highly recommend this hat, and will be purchasing more colors in the future.
customer_reviews.author: MrsMZ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Hat & Excellent Sun Protection
customer_reviews.text: I have this Scala hat in multiple colours. This one is a True Navy. I live in the Sonoran Desert area in AZ. These hats provide UPF 50+ sun protection. The brim is large enough to effectively shade my face and ears. They are not too hot, as they are 100% cotton. I purchased my 1st one in Galveston, TX. I now have 7 since purchasing this Navy colour. Love Scala brand hats.
customer_reviews.author: Colette

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Way To Keep The Sun At Bay
customer_reviews.text: I love this hat so much! The color is vibrant. The fit is perfect and you can style it so many different ways so no 2 days of the week are alike. I’m going to have to purchase more colors to go with all my outfits. What’s even better is that it a year round fabric that’s great for summer, spring and fall. It’s a keeper! 🥰👒❤️💃🏼
customer_reviews.author: LuLu

customer_reviews.title: One of the best sun hats on the market
customer_reviews.text: One of the best sun hats on the market. When I am going to be in the sun for a period of time, this is my go to hat. This hat has a wide enough brim to give shade to my face but does not flop around. It adjusts inside the hat to fit your head and has UV protection in the lining. I love that this hat folds up smallso I can take it in my bag. I have bought a few different colors and I am never disappointed when they come. I would recommend this hat for protection in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Rae

customer_reviews.title: so many colors, so many choices
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a women's hat we found while on vacation in Hawaii. The broader brim is better for wear and keeping the sun off than the shorter brim. My husband uses these for golf to protect his head, face and ears from the sun, as he has had 2 bouts of skin cancer. They are washable; however, I recommend the crown be stuffed with tissue paper to hold the shape and place on a towel to air dry. I wish Scala would add ventilation to it, as the hat can get hot under the Florida sun. Otherwise, I don't hesitate to recommend such a well made hat in lots of fun colors.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Sun Hat
customer_reviews.text: This will be a darling hat once it has recovered from the poor delivery where it was wadded up and shoved in a plastic bag. The brim is stiff enough to unfold it to covered the entire back of the neck, or to fold the brim upward. The cotton strings inside the hat make it adjustable. Perfect for the sun.
customer_reviews.author: lmoon

customer_reviews.title: Stiffish cotton will hold chosen brim position
customer_reviews.text: Fabric is a bit stiff, but in a good way that the brim will stay as you fold it. Interior ropes don't do much to adjust hat size. The actual head fit is a bit spacious, but I have a smaller noggin. It's still wearable and does a nice job with sun protection. Big brim without feeling too flouncy or too campgroundy. Photo is the "teal" option.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The inside is slightly large for me, but there is a drawstring to make it fit tighter. (I also have no hair thanks to chemo, so that makes it a little larger anyway.) It’s great for the sun- nice large brim keeps the sun off your face/neck easily. I love the sea foam-ish color I bought. I got this on the recommendation of a good friend, and I would recommend it to anyone. If you want a comfortable hat with a good brim complete with SPF protection, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Bianchi

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: This hat is perfect for blocking sun and is very pretty on.the crown is big enough to cover my hair and a big clip, many aren’t. I have now recieved this white and a red both colors are great and am now expecting a black. You can wear the brim rolled up all around or up in back down in front fedora style, rolled down is good looking and covers more. Very happy with these others i have bought not as good a quality.
customer_reviews.author: angela zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Great hat.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hat that comes in many good colours. It is comfortable and provides excellent sun protection. The wide brim is versatile and can be turned up or down as needed. Most 1 size-fits-all-hats are too large on me so l really like the inner adjusting tie. This is my second Scala hat. My first, a white one, has worn well and held up through repeated packing and washings. When I found it was available in turquoise, I just had to have it.
customer_reviews.author: Double DD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace a white one that I couldn't find an exact match for. This hat is perfect AND it comes in so many colors. I don't have to worry about not finding it again. Perfect. It is just what I was looking for. The brim conforms to various shapes without actual wire. It also folds for travel.
customer_reviews.author: SurferGirl

customer_reviews.title: New form of packaging the hat is a BIG problem.
customer_reviews.text: Love the Scala Hats, necessary with bouts of skin cancer. I must remark on today's shipment. The hat was folded tightly into a small plastic bag. which is not good for the hat. There are hard folds in the crown and on the rim edging that are difficult to smooth out, I'm hoping it can be done.. I much prefer the whole hat packaging. If the is the new packaging, I'll be forced to shop elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The one seems to be a little shorter so I feel it might come off more easily. It does provide great sun protection
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these hats for gardening several years ago and decided to buy another one for golf this year. The one seems to be a little shorter so I feel it might come off more easily. It does provide great sun protection. I would have preferred the oatmeal color, but for some reason it was much more expensive. So I settled on 'sand'. I recommend this hat. It is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: FJLTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Cheap fabric, a little wrinkled, very light weight,  but holds its shape.
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is unusual. It feels cheap, and causes the hat to look slightly wrinkled, is very light weight, but it holds its basic shape fairly well, at least when it’s dry, and for that reason I am keeping It. I have not gotten it wet, don’t know what to expect about that.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: I've had hats that block rays somewhat better, but few that I appreciate more due to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a sun sensitivity & must wear hats during peak UV hours. I've had hats that block rays somewhat better, but few that I appreciate more due to the fun color & style of this hat. With Scala hats, the brighter reddish shades have a sort of starched feel, (it may be the dye, IDK), and that makes for a slightly stiffer hat than the non-red/orange/pink shades. This hat washes well (by hand) and does not fade easily. It takes a few days and wears to get the wrinkles out of most Scala hat's I've ordered, but afterwards, these hats are good to go & quite hardy.
customer_reviews.author: Sey

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hat for a non-Hat Person
customer_reviews.text: I hate hats in general, but I love this hat. It does not make my head feel hot, it doesn't smoosh my hair, and it doesn't make me look like I have a giant head, which most hats do. I'm going to buy another one soon. I like the medium blue, it's a cheerful color next to my pale face. Brim stays where I mold it.
customer_reviews.author: Christy in Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Attractive SPF hats in pretty colors
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these hats! I have them in 7 colors to go with my clothes. My skin is very sensitive and I need SPF hats whenever I am outside during daytime. These are effective sun screens and very attractive. I get compliments, often from complete strangers, when I wear one.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Hat is very comfortable and size is adjustable. Hat ordered is white and had a small stain on it. I have managed to clean and lighten the stain. Zappos has contacted me and they have been amazing to help and want me to be satisfied. Great customer service! I won’t hesitate to purchase again from this Seller!
customer_reviews.author: Bennita L. Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Not as Versatile as I'd Hoped
customer_reviews.text: This hat has a drawstring to make it smaller, but whenever I tighten it, the cord at the back forms a knot that irritates my head. If I let the cord hang down, it rubs against my neck and feels like a pesky fly. And then, also, it slides nearly over my eyes. As I intended it for hiking, it's proving to be not very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase all around!
customer_reviews.text: Great sunhat, and it actually fit my big head with a little room to spare, so no headaches! Sizing is easily adjusted with the inside covered drawstring...better too big than too small. Rim can be adjusted to be worn different ways since the 100% cotton material is not too stiff. Only problem is choosing a color due to so many options, some for men as well. Love my Salmon, which is a medium soft coral color and would look good on anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Casa

customer_reviews.title: I love all Scala Woman’s Hats.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought at least seven of these hats...just different colors. True to color and drawstring makes adjusting to your size easy. Love they are spf 50. I love wearing hats over sunglasses and these hats protect your eyes from uv rays better than sung,asses. The color red was new to me, but I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Coleen P Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sun Hat!
customer_reviews.text: I love hats, but not huge hats. However, now that I live near the beach and I'm prone to sunburns, I needed a beach hate. I purchased this based on reviews and the colors! If I could afford it, I would buy more in other colors! This hat is super comfortable, adjusts easily, stays on (even on windy days) and is very attractive (think Audrey Hepburn)! I love that you can put the brim up or down depending on how much coverage you want. It's also shaped in such a way that it never blocks or impedes your view. Which means I can wear it and take pictures! Strong material, great colors, genius design!
customer_reviews.author: Cr8zyC8tL8dy

customer_reviews.title: love the scala hats
customer_reviews.text: love the scala hats. I am a golfer and always wear a hat. The string makes it adjustable so, when it is windy I can make it tighter and when it is very sunny I can turn down the brim. Washing can be tricky, let it dry on a round stand and then spray with a mild starch to give it body. Sorry they do not make the lemon yellow color. Someone stole mine. I took it off at a meeting and never saw it again.
customer_reviews.author: p.a.bowe

customer_reviews.title: SIZE
customer_reviews.text: THEY SENT ME A WIDE BRIM AND IT WAS MUCH TOO LARGE FOR MY SMALL HEAD. EXCHANGED IT FOR A MEDIUM AND IT IS PERFECT. SCALA IS THE ONLY HAT I BUY. I ALSO LIKE THE ADJUSTMENT STRING. THE PERIWINKLE IS VERY FLATTERING. GOOD CUSTOMER SERVICE ALTHOUGH THE PROCESS FOR RETURNING IT WAS CONFUSING. YOU NEED TO TAKE A PICTURE AND PRINT IT AND THE DIRECTIONS WERE NOT TOO CLEAR.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the Hat but--
customer_reviews.text: Love the hat. It's the 2nd one I've bought. I've worn the other one for 5 years, machine wash in net bag, iron it w/spray starch. This new one arrived a wrinkled mess but I kept it anyway. Steamed it. Sprayed w/warm water and ironed it. Fit the crown down over a new roll of paper towels which smooth out the wrinkles. The wide brim gives great sun protection. The brim also flips up easily and stays up.
customer_reviews.author: HarrrietZSchwarz

customer_reviews.title: My go to sun hat for Texas sunshine
customer_reviews.text: It’s my go to hat for Texas spring, summer, and fall. It holds up well. Due to the fabric it’s a more casual look, exactly what I need. The drawstring ensures perfect snug fit. And I’ve successfully washed and then reshaped (with starch/hat stiffener and steamer).
customer_reviews.author: Houston Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT !!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleasantly surprised by this hat. I thought that the draw string sounded iffy but it works fine. The brim is very wide and the edge can be turned up or down. The fabric is nice with enough body to hold its shape. I bought this for sun protection and it will totally do that but it is also very chic looking. The brim, to the edge, is 4 1/2 inches - 3 1/2 if you turn up the edge. But, because it is angled downward it gives you much more sun protection that if it projected straight out. So, yes, go for it !!!
customer_reviews.author: Countess Ferrari

customer_reviews.title: I love these hats
customer_reviews.text: I love these hats SO much. I have had many over the years. My one and only problem is that the rim gets too floppy if you have to wash the hat. And sometimes I wish they had an elastic that I could tuck under a hair bun -- I lost this particular hat on a very windy day in Sardinia... I ordered another one immediately because they are just too great.
customer_reviews.author: Lovisa

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I am dissapointed in the product before I left a review. The hat is black but the lining inside it is white. The hat has to be worn certain way or otherwise the white lining is visible, and looks cheap. This was not advertised in the pictures, it makes no sense to me why whiteining is used in a black hat. I let the company know but I didn't get a response from them either.
customer_reviews.author: RP788

customer_reviews.title: Choose color carefully
customer_reviews.text: I ordered first in poppy and it did not match the color image online so I returned and reordered it in olive. Very cute and stylish as the wide brim can be crushed, rolled and manipulated. Travels well. I took off 2 stars as the color chart was quite off and the first order took longer to arrive than I expected. And depending on the color choice, the prices fluctuate. So the olive hat ended up being somewhat more than the red one and if I had not needed it for a trip, I might have hesitated before spending nearly $24.
customer_reviews.author: Annie O

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my first Scala hat several years ago. I really loved that hat but it was time for a new one and didn’t think twice about buying another Scala product. The fit is adjustable so can tighten it some if it’s a windy day at the beach. I love the color and the wider brim. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Pookiebeardog

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: This is cute and just what I wanted. Larger than something like a fedora, so I get much better coverage, yet not huge, Study, so it will hold its shape, but it collapses and folds well.I can easily shape the brim for different looks too. I wish the inside wasn't white' it will show dirt easily.
customer_reviews.author: chromacosmic

customer_reviews.title: Not the same....
customer_reviews.text: I own 3 other Scala hats and the teal one I just got is not the same medium brim of the others. It is in between the medium and large. Disappointed since the description said it was the same as the others I received in different yrs. The quality is the same but I don't like the larger brim. Not worth my time to return.
customer_reviews.author: EAM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sun Hat
customer_reviews.text: Great sun hat. I already had one, but wanted another. The adjustable size is great as I have a BIG head
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Woman

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage from sun but to heavy and thick for ...
customer_reviews.text: Good coverage from sun but to heavy and thick for my liking. I bought red and understand everybody's color on screen of computer is different but in person this hat is very bright red! A summer red. It looked like a dark red on my screen but definetly not dark. To vivid for me. Also no strap for under chin for a windy day on Boardwalk for which I bought it for. If your looking to block sun from face this is a good hat but don't like the weight. Would return but to much of a bother.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable & great sunblocker headware
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this hat. I bought it to wear at Disney which was supposed to be the hottest week to be there. The hat did perfectly to cover my head and as a great sunblocker. It's very comfy. Has an adjustable string on the inside that let's you adjust fit. Loved it.
customer_reviews.author: EasyCamper

customer_reviews.title: Great hat but not a fan of adjustment string inside
customer_reviews.text: I always like Scala hats since they're good quality and easy to carry around since it folds nicely. The only thing I don't like is the big drawstring inside of the hat for size adjustment. It's like a rope, gets a big bothersome and bulky when you wear the hat. But overall, I like it. Very practical hat.
customer_reviews.author: lamama

customer_reviews.title: I am a hat person from way back when and ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a hat person from way back when and have probably owned over 50 hats over the years. This one is a loser. The only reason I gave it one star is because the color was true. The material is crunchy starchy awfulness. The bowl is misshapen. The brim is not symmetrical. Simply not up to par.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy B.

customer_reviews.title: It's my third hat.
customer_reviews.text: I keep giving them away, I receive so many compliments. The red is great. Fades with time and gets softer but I love this hat. Keeps the sun off, doesn't make you hot and adjusts to your head so easily, won't fly away on a windy day.
customer_reviews.author: jilliej

customer_reviews.title: Great Sun Hat
customer_reviews.text: I would give this hat 5 stars if it had a chin strap; I bought it knowing that it didn't, because it otherwise met my needs. A wide-brimmed, SUV protecting hat to wear in the Arizona sun. I love the color choices (I have two, one in white and one in coral rose), the ability to shape the brim in several different ways, and the ability to adjust the size of the hat, as most single size hats are too big for me. I think I can figure out how to add a chin strap; the wide brim does make the hat prone to blowing off in even a slight breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Joni Lehman

customer_reviews.title: Practical, yet stylish
customer_reviews.text: This is my second hat like this. It is great for keeping the sun off your face, lightweight and also cute! The other one I washed so much that it didn’t look that great when socializing which is why I bought the second, sharp-looking hat.
customer_reviews.author: Karen in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Great Hat!
customer_reviews.text: I started out with another color and now have several. I love that this color isn't yellow, green, or tan-ish. It's like a low-chroma bone color, so it goes great with a lot. There's a reason I see these washable sun hats all over my walking neighborhood. They're the greatest!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Well Made
customer_reviews.text: I wore this hat on a Pensacola Beach vacation and my face, neck, and ears stayed sunburn free. Even though it does not have a strap it stayed on well. The inside tie works well to adjust fit and keep it on. It is very well constructed and I believe it will last a long time. I did machine wash it once and let it air dry with no problems. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have fair skin, live in Arizona and don't like the sun in my face when I walk my dog, so a sun hat is a necessity for me. I decided on this hat because of it's big brim and I got the pale yellow because it was the cheapest. Note that the more popular colors are nearly twice the price! The hat fits well although it could be a little deeper. The first three days that I had this hat, it was very windy and I pulled the adjustable cords tight to be sure the hat stayed on and it did - just fine. The hat does the job and I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeca

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Inferior Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love these hats!! I've owned two in the past; I lost one, and my dog ate the other. I purchased both at my local (brick n mortar) home and garden store. They didn't have black in stock so I checked Amazon, and was happy to be able to order one. The hat I received ('new', with tags), however, was of extremely inferior quality, to say the least. It was fraying and falling apart after just a couple of wears! My other hats from this brand lasted forever. I don't get it, and I'm very disappointed in this purchase. In fact, I'm now afraid to purchase a new one at my local store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Own many, love them.
customer_reviews.text: I want 100% cotton, not blends, and the adjustment cord is necessary, because I have a small head, so I tie it tighter. I have a dozen or so of these hats in different colors. Obviously, I find them serviceable. I get compliments on the style and colors. However, while traveling I realized - as every ounce counts - they are heavier than I want to be carrying on long trips with many flights.
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sun hat!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these hats! I have one in just about every color. They can work for both casual and a bit dressed up. The brim is wide but not ridiculously so. The upturned brim gives a nice look to the bucket — looks like a nice sun hat and not a boonie hat! Stylish. I have a large head and these fit me perfectly ...
customer_reviews.author: Jen Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled with this hat!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this hat so much that I purchased a second one. It is a great beach, pool or overall sun hat. I love the wide brim which is soft and easily folded into various shapes. The hat is also very packable. Most importantly it fits and did not blow off on the windy beach. I have a large head and most one size fits all hats do not work for me. The inside circumference measures approximately 23 1/2 inches. For those of you who need a smaller size there is an adjustable cord which tightens the fit. Overall a great practical and stylish hat! I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Latte Lover

customer_reviews.title: Very good hat for mutiple uses.
customer_reviews.text: Hat arrived in excellent condition. I bought it in the Oatmeal color which goes with everything. Pros: I packed the hat in my carry on bag for my recent trip to Mexico and it held up very well; the brim is sufficiently wide to shade my entire face and the back of my neck. Cons: The only downside for me is that the hat material is not very breathable, so my head would get overheated and sweaty when walking around in full sun. The tighter weave of the material is great for keeping the sun off my skin, but not so great for staying cool. Overall, I would recommend this hat, especially at the current price point.
customer_reviews.author: KitKat65

customer_reviews.title: Pretty light pink color, and light weight cotton.
customer_reviews.text: This pretty pink hat was exactly what I needed. Instead of fussing with my thinning hair, and applying filler powder to hide the sparseness, I just put this cheery, AND COMFORTABLE, lightweight hat on when going out to run errands. I have several straw hats, but I realized that this is the one I always grab, because I find it to be much more comfortable, and less cumbersome than a straw hat, especially for driving. I also appreciate the light pink color gives my face a little glow, which I can use at my age of over 65.
customer_reviews.author: partly

customer_reviews.title: Great Hat!  Perfect for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hat!!!! I chose the color “mist” and it’s perfect. I wore it in Hawaii and it looked very stylish on the beach. The drawstring cord tightens it down so the wind doesn’t knock it off. It traveled well in the suitcase. It did not wrinkle and it held its shape. I just shook it out and redid the brim and it was ready to go. I need to buy another to wear this summer in my sports car. You won’t be disappointed with this hat.
customer_reviews.author: Roselady

customer_reviews.title: Over the top
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice hat. Just fits my enormous head, though I removed the inner drawstring so as to make more space! It will provide shade from the sun but is a bit too ridiculous looking for daily wear. Has a nice Audrey Hepburn flair for the beach or a day relaxing on your patio with a drink in your hand. Would be great for gardening too! But for a stroll around the city? Noooo.... I'm hoping the medium brim is big enough to fit my hard to fit big head!
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: hat for sun sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Gave me lots of shade, even kept the sun off the back of my neck. It kept its shape well even when stuffed into a bag, there is a cord in the crown so it's adjustable .. loved it
customer_reviews.author: Diane E. Das

customer_reviews.title: Not for the big headed
customer_reviews.text: I have a large head - not so abnormally large that I cannot wear normal hats, but it's big enough that I learned quickly I would never own a trendy hat. I had such high hopes for this hat. Alas, even with the promise of adjustable straps, it wasn't meant to be. It clamped on my skull, I could feel the pressure from the indentation that was being impressed upon my forehead. I pulled and pulled, wanting for it to work, and it was just too tight. So if you're one of those people who routinely have a tight time trying on hats, know that this hat is probably not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Rye Bread

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hat; good fit, washable, packable
customer_reviews.text: My head is 22" around and the hat had plenty of room. I tie the drawstring more snugly and even on a very windy day it doesn't blow off. I own three colors and all fit consistently. They pack well and look decent after. It has a wide brim that provides even more coverage when the cuff is turned down. I wash the hat by hand, reshape while wet, and hang clipped by the brim (using a plastic skirt hanger with clips) to drip dry. As it dries I spray the underside and topside of the brim with heavy starch. It comes out beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: You can make it smaller with a hot water wash and dry.
customer_reviews.text: This hat is right between fashionable and casual, a perfect spot. The cord at the inside edge of the brim is quite thick and since I found it uncomfortable, I removed it. Then the hat was too loose so I machine washed and dried on hot and it fit perfectly. You can even iron the brim to bring back its stiffness, or leave it rumpled for a casual effect.
customer_reviews.author: old timer

customer_reviews.title: Mohs and reconstruction surgery $25,000.  Hat to protect scalp $25.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this hat for my Florida vacation after having my 2 ND mohs procedure and reconstruction scalp surgery 2 months ago. It held it's shape after being packed into carry on and checked baggage. Provided great coverage. It is adjustable but was a little surprised to see such a thick cotton cord inside. In beach photo hat was pulled down a little due to ocean breeze. Will be purchasing in more colors...
customer_reviews.author: Buying online

customer_reviews.title: Size is way off!
customer_reviews.text: I already had this hat and this was my second purchase. I absolutely love my original hat and would love this one too but it is so much smaller! It is a “one size” hat so I am extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: kismet

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great. Well made. I have received many compliments when I wear this hat. The price is great. Will be ordering more to give as gifts to Senior Friends. Try to be a Blessing! Put a smile on someone’s face.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect! This hat rolls up for packing
customer_reviews.text: This is a "must have" for me. It's perfect! This hat rolls up for packing, making it great for travel. Just unroll and it looks great. Inside, around crown band is a cord that you can adjust, making the crown snugger or lose. Good option if you wear your long hair up or down. I've worn this hat on a windy day. I tightened the cord and the hat stayed put through all the gusts. The brim is moldable, giving you different looks. I love all the color options and I plan on getting another one or two, so my whole wardrobe will have a complimenting hat!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: What a lovely hat. It's beautiful and comfortable. The brim is exactly what I was hoping for. It's a lot wider than my other hats. And there are so many colors to choose from. I also thought the price was reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Girl

customer_reviews.title: This isn't labeled a Scala hat
customer_reviews.text: While this hat is very similar to the Scala hat - the label actually says Callanan Restort. it looks a lot like the Scala in size and material - but the crown of the hat is just a little different.- it does not have as much body. And, like the Scala, the crown is incredibly wrinkled - especially the "band" that goes around the crown, even more so - and no matter what I do I can't get the wrinkles out. The bank actually seems like is almost like "folded" - and pressed together - which makes it not stand up as nicely as it should
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Good value-
customer_reviews.text: Good sun coverage. Breathable cotton fabric. No chin strap- I’m thinking maybe NOT a beach hat where the wind may be a factor. Wore it on the trail and in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: C. HAdams

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sun hat! Shady and stylish.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of this kind I've purchased this year. It's the only hat I've found that shades even my neck, yet looks great. Brim can be shaped to be fashionable, provide more shade, etc. After seeing mine my mom and cousin also bought one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabric could be better quality
customer_reviews.text: This hat is adjustable with a drawstring inside the band. The cord is somewhat thick and makes a bulge if you knot it. The fabric is coarse, depending on the color. I bought the same hat a long time ago and the fabric quality seems to have gone down a bit. The shape is what is good about this one. Would flatter most everyone. It is packable and washable but DON'T dry it! It will shrink. It loses a bit of sizing when washed but I use them for gardening because of good coverage and not washing is not at option after a day in the garden. A light ironing with starch will bring it back to original.
customer_reviews.author: Cow Town Girl

customer_reviews.title: Its faded
customer_reviews.text: I used this hat for water aerobics and to keep the sun from my face. The pool is chlorinated and the hat has faded quite a bit and its blotchy all over. What a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Traveling in the Tropics
customer_reviews.text: This hat just took a one-month tour of Indonesia and with its broad brim proved to be an ideal choice. It recovered from being packed flat in a checked bag, and stayed on my head in windy conditions because of the adjustable tie in the crown (although I still wish it had a chin strap for added security.) In a tropical climate you will get hat head, and your head will sweat. But the hat is attractive and you can re-style your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Maud

customer_reviews.title: Very flattering hat!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this hat! I just ordered my second one and will probably get one more . I have a large head and since it is adjustable, it fits perfectly. It has just the right amount of style without looking too feminine for me. They are very well made. Couldn't be happier with it!!
customer_reviews.author: K.M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sun hat
customer_reviews.text: This hat is just perfect to shield my face and neck on a Florida vacation. I love the versatility of the brim, and the color is a deep, rich, blue-red. The hat arrived in great condition -- packed with a cardboard liner to preserve the shape. I'll be buying more of these. It is somewhat large -- I have a big head and I'll need to cinch it in with the drawstring. But that's perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: LadyprofTop Contributor: Crochet

customer_reviews.title: Best hat ever for keeping the sun off my face.
customer_reviews.text: I love this hat and own three of them. I also sent one to my sister who also has concerns about keeping the sun from her face. Can't recommend these hats highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M. Moriarity

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and effective
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hat just before an outdoor volunteer project in the intense Colorado sun. I have a rather small head and this fit me very well without having to adjust the drawstrings. It was perfect for keeping the sun off my face and neck and was super comfortable. The material feels very durable. I got the taupe, which was a bit darker than pictured. I probably would have gone with "natural" had I known the actual color. I will update the review after a few months in regard to the durability, but for now I'm very glad that I spent a few extra bucks to get a good quality hat.
customer_reviews.author: hilaryclaire

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my big head...
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't impressed when I first tried it on. But that was my fault. I have thick voluminous hair and also a large head. After I got my hair settled down, I could see that the hat fit me very well. The hat will work on someone who has a normal sized head with thinner hair. Initially when I tried it on, it was floating on my hair and not secure on my head. Once I got my hair volume down and pulled it back, it fit without any need for tightening the inner strings. However, I wouldn't dare wear this on a windy day. But it is an awesome sunhat if you need sun protection like I do.
customer_reviews.author: CitiGirl

customer_reviews.title: Love these hats
customer_reviews.text: I lived in the desert for 18 years. I wore these hats for the SPF feature for when I was playing golf. I also wear when on vacation. Nice, all occasion wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Toots Q

customer_reviews.title: stylish and practical
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful hat and has an adjustable inside band for tightening or loosening. Only issue I had is that even with the band tightened to fit snugly, I nearly lost the hat in a gust of wind.
customer_reviews.author: Woof Mum

customer_reviews.title: Cute and protected
customer_reviews.text: I like this hat. Lots of compliments. Excellent protection against the sun's harmful rays. This is my second one actually. I learned the hard way that it is not machine washable. Spot clean it or spray it with fabreeze fabric after a sweaty day.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Best Sun Hat Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best sun hat I have ever bought. First, it’s rated SPF 50, second it’s so classy. Today FOUR people complimented me on it (and one was a dermatologist!). I LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Unspecified Brim led to me order one too wide
customer_reviews.text: I owned at Scala I loved and wanted to other colors. It looked the same online so ordered 4 other colors. The brim was not the same and I returned them all. Please find a way to specific width of brim compared to other options among Scala hats.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Kritis

customer_reviews.title: Nice hat, but green instead of teal
customer_reviews.text: I love these hats. I have them in multiple colors. I took away two stars for this because the color is much more green than teal. Not at all like the picture. I’ll keep it because it’s a pain to send back, but it’s not the color I wanted at all.
customer_reviews.author: YaYaHenry

customer_reviews.title: Love this hat!!
customer_reviews.text: The hat covers both my neck and face. It has SPF 50 coverage which is very important for someone who is fair skinned. Travels well and very cool because it is lightweight. Breathes better then my straw hat. Cooler.
customer_reviews.author: ChristyA

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with product
customer_reviews.text: I got this hat mainly because I needed a foldable hat to take on at trip. Very happy with product. Nice wide brim for sun protection. I got the salmon and the color is true to the product pictures, a very pretty warm pink. Also love that the rim is wired and can be shaped. The adjustable band for size is a nice touch. Took away 1 star, however, because the first time I tried to pull the strings to draw the hat tighter, part of the stitching in the rim came undone (see photo). Easily fixable and won't impact the function.
customer_reviews.author: BEJU

customer_reviews.title: Great hat, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This hat is awesome! Living in a place with sun 99% of the time this hat is wonderful! It covers my neck, ears, head perfectly! Fits well, is adjustable and I can SEE out of the sides... my issue with big hats is that it's hard to see when they flop around in your face... driving me NUTS... this stays on nicely and looks good! It goes well with most outfits. I wouldn't mind buying a few more colors. It's a great alternative to always wearing a baseball cap, which is kind of "boyish"... I like this as it's more feminine! Great hat... highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie R.

customer_reviews.title: Best sun hat!!
customer_reviews.text: Scalia Sun hats are the best !! Great sun protection and so stylish. Great price too! So many colors - I had to get white and coral. Both are so cute !!
customer_reviews.author: AnnieG

customer_reviews.title: Love these hats!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these hats and already own three of them. I inadvertently ordered the wide brim vs the medium brim. The difference is subtle, but when it's on, the wide is just too wide for me. FYI, measure the brim of the current one you own, if you do, to make sure you order the correct hat.
customer_reviews.author: kdawggy

customer_reviews.title: My favorite hat brand
customer_reviews.text: My favorite hat brand!!! I have several hats by this brand because they always look great, hold their shape and are reasonably priced. Got this white one for a beach trip and loved it!! If you want a great looking quality hat, these are the ones
customer_reviews.author: DJM

product_meta.title: Scala Women's Cotton Hat with Inner Drawstring and Upf 50+ Rating
feature_bullets: Chic cotton comfort – These 100% cotton womens summer hats embrace a look, a feel, and an experience you won’t want to ignore.
Always in style – The optional fold-over 2.5” brim makes this travel hat one that can go anywhere. Flaunt your style at music festivals, garden clubs, tennis matches, brunches, or on cruises.
Elegant protection – Protection from the sun is paramount. This womens sun hat provides you with UPF 50+ premium protection blocking more than 98% of UV radiation emitted by the sun.

All look, no effort – Create a look you’ll love, and recreate it as often as you like. Each packable sun hat can be folded and hand-washed and still retain the original look. An adjustable inner drawstring ensures that the right look fits perfectly as well.
